forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city is enveloped in a gentle embrace of clouds, casting a soft, muted glow on the streets below. With temperatures hovering around a cool 49 degrees, a slight uptick to around 51 is anticipated overnight. The tranquil north-northeast winds, brushing in at about 7 mph, add a crispness to the evening air, enhancing the feeling of a typical San Francisco night—a touch of chill mixed with the spectral lights of the city.

The morning promises to bring a transformation as the clouds clear, revealing mostly sunny skies, with highs projected near a comfortable 62. As the sun ascends, the early chill will give way to pleasant warmth, yet the afternoon may usher in cooler breezes and descending temperatures around 58. Given the fading light and the veil of clouds tonight, one might expect a hint of fog lingering near the coast, softening the outlines of the hills and the iconic structures. For those stepping out, layering will be key—a warm sweater and a light jacket for the cooler moments, perhaps complemented by comfortable shoes for an ambled stroll through the serene streets or a leisurely visit to an outdoor café. As dusk deepens, it’s an ideal time for a gentle walk along the waterfront, savoring the tranquility before the bustle of the coming day.
